reviewText:
Yes, its excellent in my book. D'Amato managed to produce mix bag of movies mostly for profit as he stated and I don't blame him as money is the name of the game. But this flick and some another bunch like 20 of them shine showing his potential. Attention to details, imagination, excellent actors, plot, music-everything done in right proportions. This Spanish edition don't have English but you can find it if you look.
Even better one is 'A Lustful Mind'.
